com.github.mrm1st3r.cards.lobby

Class LobbyJoinActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.github.mrm1st3r.cards.lobby.LobbyJoinActivity

  • public class LobbyJoinActivity
extends Activity
    This activity lists all currently available bluetooth devices and gives the user the ability to connect to one.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Lukas 'mrm1st3r' Taake

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Button btnRefresh
      Button to reactivate Bluetooth discovery and to show current discovery status.
      private ClientThread connector
      Worker thread that will try to establish a connection to a selected remote device.
      private ListView deviceList
      List that views all available remote devices.
      private ProgressDialog dlgJoin
      Dialog that is shown while a new connection is being established.
      private mDeviceAdapter
      Adapter for remote device list.
      private java.util.LinkedList<BluetoothDevice> mDeviceList
      List holding all available remote devices.
      private BroadcastReceiver mReceiver
      Receiver that will receive any discovery results and status changes.
      private boolean oldBtState
      The Bluetooth adapters enabling status before the app was started.
      private static java.lang.String TAG
      Debug tag.
